EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Data As The New Oil_Q115.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal Data Labs and DSC on January 20
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Oil and gas exploration and production activities generate large amounts of data from sensors, logistics, business operations and more. In this webinar <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=919431&s=1&k=5F7F06AF4328BD7860A7034BBC6A6099&partnerref=Pivotal>, Rashmi Raghu (Senior Data Scientist, Pivotalâ€‹) will highlight how the Pivotal Data Labs team created a failure prediction model from sensor and operator data. Models such as these can be used to build essential early warning systems, reduce costs and minimize unplanned downtime.
Given the volume, variety and velocity, gaining actionable and relevant insights from this data is challenging. Join us <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=919431&s=1&k=5F7F06AF4328BD7860A7034BBC6A6099&partnerref=Pivotal> to learn about these challenges and how to address them by leveraging Big Data technologies.
REGISTER >> <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=919431&s=1&k=5F7F06AF4328BD7860A7034BBC6A6099&partnerref=Pivotal>
We look forward to seeing you there,
The Pivotal Team DATA AS THE NEW OIL: PRODUCING VALUE IN THE OIL & GAS INDUSTRY
TUESDAY JANUARY 20, 2015 9:00AM PST REGISTER <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=919431&s=1&k=5F7F06AF4328BD7860A7034BBC6A6099&partnerref=Pivotal>
